Extremal set theory is an area
of combinatorics concerned

with questions such

collection of sets that satisfy
certain desired properties?

And the question that
we'll look at in this video

What is the largest antichain?

So this is what we

And what that theorem says is
that if you have l subsets of 1

through n such that none of the
sets is a subset of another,

then, in fact, l is, at most,
n choose the floor of n over 2.

So this answers the question
